about.heading: About Us
about.lead: Welcome to the Ministry of Energy & Water Resources of Jubaland.
about.p1: Ministry of Energy & Water Resources is one among the Jubaland State Ministries established in 2014 with responsibility for two core sectors: Water Resources and Energy. The ministry ensures equitable development, exploration, and distribution of energy and water to the people of Jubaland.
about.p2: The Ministry is responsible for the formulation, direction, and coordination of state energy and water resources. It is tasked with creating institutions that manage water resources and deliver energy and water services for the benefit of Jubaland communities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To provide adequate, safe and affordable water, hygiene and sanitation for all. An energy industry that contributes to revenue streams and the socio-economic development of the state.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To have a significant role in the socio-economic development of the people of Jubbaland State of Somalia through development and management of its water and energy resources in a sustainable manner; through provision of quality and equitable supplies in the entire state and by contributing significantly to food security and increased resilience to drought and natural disaster.

mandates.title: Ministry Mandates
items: Regulate & Set policy for Energy & Water Resources sectors
Implement & Facilitate development of the Energy & Water sectors
Provide Monitoring & Evaluation for sectoral activities
Ensure access to reliable clean energy, water resources & sewerage for society
Promote development of water & energy resources
Enhance resources mobilization for sectoral funding

cards.title: Admin, HR & Finance
cards.text: Provides administration and financial support, drives internal policy and governance for all directorates.

cards.title: Water Department
cards.text: Plans and delivers equitable water supply: boreholes, sand dams, storage and rural water systems across districts.

cards.title: Energy Department
cards.text: Develops the energy sector and improves access to reliable, affordable electricity for communities.

cards.title: Planning & Policy
cards.text: Leads research, monitoring & evaluation, policy and regulatory frameworks for energy and water sectors.

stats.text: Our projects have added over 2 MW of renewable energy to the grid.
We have provided clean water access to over 500,000 people.
We have successfully completed over 20 energy and water projects whilst running more than 10 Projects
With support from partners we have installed 2,000 Solar Streetlights in 9 districts of Jubaland State Somalia
Distributed Hygiene kits to access essential health services and improve well-being in our community.
We have constructed over 277 shallow wells and maintain them with support from our Humanitarian Partners.
We have constructed/rehabilitated over 92 boreholes in two regions of Jubaland (Lower Juba & Gedo) in 12 districts.
Constructed over 226 water kiosks in 12 districts of Jubaland.

cards.title: Energy Policy Planning
cards.text: We help governments create forward-thinking energy policies that ensure sustainable development

cards.title: Resource Management
cards.text: Our team provides strategies for effective management of natural resources to promote environmental balance

cards.title: Water Supply Solutions
cards.text: We deliver comprehensive solutions for ensuring clean and consistent water supply to communities.

cards.title: Renewable Energy Projects
cards.text: Join us in promoting renewable energy by developing wind, solar, and hydroelectric projects.

cards.title: Infrastructure Development
cards.text: Our experts oversee the design and implementation of efficient energy and water infrastructure.

cards.title: Community Training
cards.text: We offer training programs to educate communities on sustainable energy practices and resource conservation.
